name: Transmutation
description:
In a Nuclear reactor facilities canteen set 5 levels underground where a meltdown happens that creates mutants who are out to eat the late night crew.

Survive for two minutes while the elevator arrives.

Switch between three playable characters who have gathered an objects around the canteen to protect themselves with.

Controller operated Game play.

Created by three University students over 6 weeks.

- Nic Lyness (Designer)

- Jordon Dodds (Programmer)

- Pritish Choudhary (Programmer)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Sounds: Chris Ware & Ash Ball.

Models: Chenlin Wang & Peter Buck.
